      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20

          text run at (0,0) width 154: "The background color of "

          LayoutText {#text} at (154,0) size 63x19

          text run at (217,0) width 4: " "
          text run at (221,0) width 354: "should turn to green when it is activated and come back to "
